Posts.Content: Oct 10, 2012 01:17PM NYBubbles wrote: Go with van zee - she is brilliant - probably one of the top five in the world.  I am on Long Island and so happy with my team, but if I lived closer to the city, she would have been my number one choice.  All of their surgeons are world leaders, my surgeon did his training there.  They do so many operations that any of their surgeons would be a safe set of hands.  I think for your sanity you need to pick one and then let them do their job.  Second guessing is counter productive and MSK have resources that other hospitals can only dream of.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: How to choose best surgeon... needhope NYBubbles
